tagline: The Basic Introduction to the Knowledge Cloud Research Group at Zhejiang University
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Knowledge Cloud Computing
body:
### Welcome to Knowledge Cloud Research Group.
This group intends to perform research on _**Knowledge Search Engine**_ with the same purpose as Google Knowledge Graph, WikiData, Wolfgram Alpha, etc. The basic technology that we are interested in is the Semantic Web technologies. 

### Join this Group
* Subscribe to the group mail-list: http://tech.groups.yahoo.com/group/ccwiki_zju/
* Participate the development: https://github.com/knowledge-cloud 

### Projects List
* CCWiki: A Social Shopping Application based on Semantic Media Wiki and Semantic Mashup. [More](https://github.com/knowledge-cloud/cc-wiki)
* sMash: A mashup engine that can harvest data from all kinds of online data APIs using the Semantic Web technologies. [More](https://github.com/knowledge-cloud/sMash) 

Useful Links
* W3C Semantic Web Group Homepage: http://www.w3.org/standards/semanticweb/
* Google Knowledge Graph: http://www.google.com/insidesearch/features/search/knowledge.html
* Wiki Data Project: http://meta.wikimedia.org/wiki/Wikidata 
* The Wolfram Alpha Knowledge Engine: http://www.wolframalpha.com/
